column1: Rida has 84 stickers. She wants to share them equally among 4 friends. How many stickers will each friend get?
Sam has 48 apples. He wants to divide them equally among 6 baskets. How many apples will be in each basket?
"Lisa has 96 candies. She wants to distribute them equally among 8 of her classmates. How many candies will each classmate receive?"
"Jake has 80 marbles. He wants to share them equally among 5 friends. How many marbles will each friend get?"
"Sarah has 72 pencils. She wants to divide them equally among 9 students. How many pencils will each student get?"
